meanings.definition: Benadryls (noun): a brand name for a medication containing diphenhydramine used to treat allergies and allergic reactions.
meanings.sent1: After my bee sting, the doctor gave me some benadryls to reduce the swelling.
meanings.sent2: I always keep a pack of benadryls in my bag in case of an allergic reaction.
meanings.sent3: The sneezing cat mistakenly took my benadryls, thinking they were treats!
meanings.sent4: The benadryls acted like a shield, protecting me from the pollen in the air.
meanings.sent5: The pharmacist recommended the benadryls for my itchy rash, and they worked like magic.

meanings.definition: Benadryls (verb): to administer or take Benadryl medication for relief of allergy symptoms.
meanings.sent1: Remember to benadryls before going to the park if you have allergies.
meanings.sent2: She quickly benadryls herself when she noticed the mosquito bite.
meanings.sent3: I had to benadryls my friend after she accidentally ate peanuts.
meanings.sent4: He benadryls every night before bed to avoid waking up with a stuffy nose.
meanings.sent5: The nurse will benadryls you if you start showing signs of an allergic reaction.
